title: I brought the boy to his homeland

comments.comment: Big thanks to Ridge for sponsoring the channel! Here’s the site if you want to check them out (and get 40% off some of their products) >  https://ridge.com/pewdiepie

Marzia: Rubs her hands on the rubber mat

Bjorn: "That's the funniest shit I have ever seen"
We need to give Marzia more credit, the way she edits these videos really pull on the heart strings in the best ways

PewDiePie In 2011: Growing Up With Pewds, Bro's Til The End

PewDiePie In 2024: Fatherhood With Pewds, Still Bro's Til The End

-Teacher: Bjorn why don't you tell us about yourself? 

-Bjorn: I'm half Swedish and half Italian but I was born in Japan, I speak english, swedish, japanese and italian, and also my family is basically internet royalty.

This kid will be the most interesting person in the room everywhere.
Dude's got that Ghibli life going
Bjorn is so lucky to be surrounded by amazing and kind people, like everyone loves him, his mom, dad, grandparents, parents' friends and all. They are the most wholesome group on the platform.
Felix being excited over the 4 leaf clover, so he can give it to Bjorn is really cute. I think there was another one next to the one he found.

I still can't get over the fact that like 11 years ago I'd be coming home from school and not doing my homework so I could watch some swedish man with a funny accent scream about barrels
Now I get home from work to watch that same man go on a trip with his wife and son.
Hit me like a train when he showed that basement

“Everyone wave to the vlog!”
Jack: immediately flips off
so poetic that a channel with over 100 million subscribers uploads simple and wholesome vlogs. it’s truly what youtube was made for
Bjorn will have one of the most insane dad lore of the history
Martzia is looking so so beautiful and radiant. Its almost as if shes getting more gorgeous and glowy with every passing year
Pewds has the best character development in youtube fr
Bjorn laughing at marzia's trick and crying at felix's attempt is hilarious

Two things. 1) These videos are like a love letter to bjorn as he grows up, and i think it's amazing their family will have these moments captured forever.
2) The editing and natural style of the videos captures the mundane and gives you a thirst for living and enjoying the small things. It's my favourite content they've ever produced.

I genuinely love how happy Björn is! Nearly every clip we see of him he is smiling or laughing, he’s such a happy baby. I catch myself smiling and laughing like an idiot watching him, he’s clearly got his parents’ sense of humour. Also visiting the old filming area in the basement of Marzia’s parents’ house hit me right in the feels, I’m so proud of how much Felix and Marzia have grown since then 🥹

It makes me tear up remember seeing Felix and Marzia move from Sweden to Italy and his channel picking up and allowing them to move to UK and now to Japan and they have a child. Whoever has been here since the beginning has literally gone through an entire life with them and at times it makes me emotional

This might be my favorite "vlog episode" yet. It has everything:

Björn starting to really interact with everything and everyone around, Italy and its beautiful plains and mountains, the food, the nostalgia hit while going back to that basement where everything started, the friends you made along the way and that are still here to enjoy a treck with you around a lake, the swedes houses, the forest where you can boulder to, your parents taking time to babysit their grandson but also following and helping you bouldering...

It has everything. Family, friends, busy airports, fields, lakes, mountains, forests, rocks, pizza, houses, memories... This may be a pretty "common" way of enjoying various things of life to its fullest, but these vlogs always capture and transcribe those moments so purely it feels genuinely like the best life anyone could have.

I wish to myself, and anyone reading this, that you are, or will someday experience this kind of bliss at least once in your life. Wishing yall the best!
Felix and Jack still being such close friends that they go on holiday together just warms my heart
Soon as I saw the old spot where he used to record his early videos, I nearly cried. So many great memories and videos we got, that little kitchen he recorded in. We’ve all really came a long way.
15:13 jack holding bjorn is just so sweet man
I don’t think I’ve ever seen Pewds and Marzia look this happy. They deserve the world and more.
Felix looking like his dad more and more everyday
Björn with his little bear cap is too adorable  also love Marzia's editing in these videos, so cozy and aesthetic!
Seeing Felix, Jack and PJ all around the mat playing with Bjorn was so cute. I love this era of the channel.

Can't stress enough how this channel has become the most wholesome thing this entire platform has ever witnessed. Thanks Pewds, Marzia, this is safe haven in an otherwise sea full of drama and garbage.
10:53 Instantly recognized that room, before he even showed the corner. So awesome seeing where Felix started out to where he is now.
10:55 i had a bright grin as soon as i saw the room, so many memories watching early pewds here, fridays with pewdiepie, that one party game he played with marzia... man.
Finally Bjorn can learn about his Viking roots

theres something so heartwarming about how felix became a father himself and is constantly caring for his own child and protecting bjorn from harm. but at the end of the video felix became a child again while he is bouldering as his own parents do the same as he was to bjorn. parents yall

A tip from a former dalahästtäljare. Put the wood you want to carv in a warm water for a couple of minutes to get the outer layer to become a bit softer.

It makes it A LOT easier to carv it to the proper shape.

Then let it dry är make very small cuts to "polish" the final product! Hope you se this and that it helps!

Someone who grew up watching Marzia and Felix journey, man this video feels so so good, like all the ups and downs and now they are here with their beautiful family and it just makes me so so happy  the feeling is surreal and unexplainable.

I know their names but seeing "Jacksepticeye" hold "Pewdiepies" baby. It's so damn sweet like family meeting the new born. After watching them both for so many years with gaming content to humble video blogs. Good on them both.
Marzia letting us into her life and family in Italy was really cool.
13:54 gets me emotional, smth about seeing Jack hold Bijorn, idk man can make a grown dude cry

God I'm do glad he moved on from all the gaming stuff. I use to find comfort in his videos years ago, and though I've fallen off that band wagon. I myself have had a child recently and seeing Felix with his son and how he has grown as a person makes me look back and reflect on how things have changed and how much I have grown since then. Life is crazy man.
i actually cried when he was bouldering and see how his parents were just there to support him. All your videos are just soothing to my soul <3
Marzia is literally the PUREST of mothers I am honestly so incredibly happy for you both
Jack holding Bjorn at 13:55 is melting my heart
Bjorn is going to love these when hes older, its amazing to catch all these sweet memories

Idk why but this video made me tear up. The interactions between Pewd and his dad esp because you can see he was raised with so much love and how that lends to how he fathers Bjorn. Wholesome. 
How their friends play with Bjorn and seem to love him also warmed my heart. Seeing a baby surrounded by love both familial and not is so important for them and i really loved seeing that.
Felix really did it. He attained Eudaimonia at such a young age. He has all of it, wisdom, friendship, wealth, and power. Keep that life Felix, we are so proud of you.

I adore this content. They are living their best lives rn. Felix looking as ripped and handsome as ever, Marzia GLOWING every time shes on screen. And baby Bjorn looks JUST LIKE FELIX. I wanna cry bro.
5:55 "Love you dad"   bonk
This made me tear up. It’s so nice, I grew up watching this man scream at horror games and be silly, and now he has a whole family and his kid gets to grow up with the same guy we all did.
Felix showing where he recorded his videos when he blew up at 11:25 really shows you dont need loads of fancy tools, or expensive setups or anything. You just need a place, time, hope and charisma
The way you can see his teeth growing in as the video progresses  he’s so cute and so loved
4:35 HE EVEN GOT THE DAD SANDALS
Man, the boulder part with the parents, dad spotting and mother's the camera man. What an awesome way to bond

You can see how much love Felix and Marzia have for each other and for Bjorn. It’s just so wonderful. And then seeing Felix’s dad hold Bjorn was so sweet. Just generations of great fathers raising their kids with love and sacrifice.
Marzia's editing is a shooting balm to soul. Everything is so beautiful. Such amazing views with family and friends

it's so nice to see you trying to contain you're conection to you're heritage and showing Björn it aswell. we in Sweden are missing you and can't wait until the next time you come visit the great north( as long as you are'nt going to Denmark or Norway).
25:40 "Ah, I'm speaking Swedish to you guys. Sorry." HAHAHAHAH
I always feel like crying with Felix’s, Marzia’s and Bjorn’s vlogs. It feels like a warm embrace and a greeting from an old friend.
22:23 dad making his son and grandson giggle <3

seeing felix so happy and just living life makes me so incredibly happy, he had such a huge impact on my teenage years and seeing both him and marzia thriving and actually still in contact with Jack and PJ had me pretty much in tears. I am so happy for them

Man, the mug that says, "Don't forget to bring Stephano!" I've been watching this man for about twelve years and dude is a dad with a family now. Absolutely crazy. I love that he's just living life how he wants now and has his own little family to share it with.

I get a profound sense of peace, watching these vlogs. It's like the feeling of watching an old friend live their best life. Not in a creepy, parasocial way, but more just in a "bro looks profoundly happy and is living a really good life, I'm happy for him" kinda way.
I love it when Felix's dad is spotting him for bouldering. So wholesome

These videos make me so emotional. He really doesn’t have to let us in to his personal life (his family) but we’ve been here since before he met Marzia so it just feels like we get to share his happiness now

seeing jack hold him made me start bawllling dude its so crazy growing up with you guys:(( my daughter is turning 1 years old this week as well and watching bjorn slowly age up in this video reminded me how fast time goes by
Seeing that old Marzia's home where he filmed so many of his best videos is so nostalgic... wow, we grew so much since then

24:13 I know everyone has already said that Felix looks so much like his dad, but here his dad has Björn on his shoulders like Felix often does, making the similarities uncanny. This entire video is so wholesome, I loved it :)
such a beautiful thriving family with so much love and laughs , Felix was and will always be someone I cheer for . This is the life I strive for, you guys are seriously amazing

I love to see how much effort they are putting into being parents. I don't even see a moment where they toss the Ipad to their kid. Truely engaging 100% into the parenthood. And that takes a lot of effort
BRO THIS IS ACTUALLY SO HARTWARMING OMG
Seeing Pj and Sean being cute uncles is everything I wanted in life. Also the whole video was gorgeous, Marzia is gorgeous. Everything is gorgeous !
Watching his parents helping him boulder was so cute like truly shows that at all ages you need your parents
feels surreal to see jack holding felix's son, these 2 gave me so much entertainment when i was a kid and now they get to do it with eachother firsthand. what a cool brothership.
15:45 why this image of these guys playing with bjorn made me so emotional time flies so fast
When he switched to Swedish at 25:32 that has to be one of the cutest things I have seen in a while!!
Something about seeing Sean holding Bjorn is so fulfilling to me as someone who’s watched both of them grow up throughout the years. Felix, your content has truly affected my life. Thank you.

I can't help but think how sweet it is little Bjorn will be able to look at all these beautiful memories when he's older. You guys are the kind of parents people dream of. I love these videos, they actually bring me genuine joy.
15:07 STOOPPP Jack holding Bjorn is SO CUUUTE ️

Felix: "Say something inspirational."
Sean: "Come Brothers!"
I love how Seán and Felix became best friends after the whole shoutout competition years ago. What a beautiful friendship.
Bjorn getting to see his homeland, us seeing again where he shot a lot of videos, and reuniting with Jackspedicey. This is a really special video
I like how Felix is becoming the most traveling and loving dad ever
Bro won at life. This is the life we should all strive for.
It makes me so happy to see Pewds winning in life. We’re all getting old
22:23 grandpa making 2 generations laugh is the cutest
Something about seeing Felix and Jack together after SOOOOO LONG just makes me smile soo much
this is the most beautiful thing to see a dad being a dad

We are also the kids you raised Pewd, love you bro.



Yo bro im genuinely trynna say hes an og ytber ive watched for awhile since childhood tf are yall thinking about? Get that weird ass immature way of assuming people about their statements
Jack holding Bjorn almost brought tears to my eyes. What a full circle moment 🥹
It was so insanely cute seeing Felix's parents help and support him while he was rock-climbing! Like he was a kid again!
18:22 Jacks best noise
Seeing Felix living his best life is so wholesome. 13:40 Glad that Sean was able to make an appearance. The shots of Italy were amazing.

I love that Pewds makes these videos.
I'm sure, decades from now, Bjorn will look back at these videos, deeply thankful that his dad made them.

13:54 Jack holding Bjorn is so cute
15:05 Again

Cried my eyes out so happy for you guys… jag har tittat på dig i över tio år att få se dig så glad och leva ditt bästa liv med Björn har verkligen gjort min dag. Hoppas ni fortsätter med denna typ av video️
Seeing Jack being friends with Pewds after all these years and meeting his son!!! My heart can’t take ittttt
14:45 made me cry. I don't know but, it makes me hopeful about my own future. Proud of them and myself.
Seeing Jack holding Bjorn as they watched Pewd's made me really emotional. It brings me tears to my eyes seeing the growth of both and the new peaceful life Pewds and Marzia seem to be having!
Seeing Sean and Felix is soo heartwarming AHHHH <3
Seeing Jack and Björn interacting is so fun and wholesome. Jack is so good with kids, which is cool to see since both of these two entertained us all (Jack and Felix, not Jack and Björn lol)
seeing Felix and Jack together always makes an og fan wanna cry tears of joy

it's funny looking back between his older videos and now; one comment that stood out to me was when someone wondered what he and his son would look like on a bike ride

that comment was on his 64th happy wheels video 9 years ago

man, when I was 10-11 years old I used to watch your videos alllll the time Fridays with PewDiePie was my most favorite part of the day. I am now 21... you have a beautiful kid and a wonderful wife I'm so happy for you and I'm glad I could follow your journey. I'm sure you'll never but see this but thanks for bringing me so much joy throughout my childhood. And I hope the rest of your life is prosperous.
